## Q1
```{r}
bdays_sim = function(n){

bdays = sample(1:365, size = n, replace = TRUE)

duplicate = length(unique(bdays)) < n  #check repeated birthdays
return(duplicate)
}

bdays_sim(10)
```

```{r, error=TRUE}
sim_res =
  expand_grid(
    n = c(2, 50),
    iter = 1:10000
  )|>
  mutate(res = map_dbl(n,bdays_sim))|>
  group_by(n)|>
  summarize(prob = mean(res))

sim_res|>
  ggplot(aes(x = n, y = prob))+
  geom_line()
```
